actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend Migrant Health Act and increase appropriation.

summary.text: Extends the program for health services for domestic agricultural migrant workers, under the Public Health Service Act, by authorizing appropriations for such programs of $60,000,000 for fiscal year 1974, $105,000,000 for fiscal year 1975, and $120,000,000 for fiscal year 1976. Authorizes appropriations of a total of $150,000,000 for fiscal year 1973-1977 for hospital care to domestic agricultural migratory workers and their families. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 242h)

titles.title: A bill to extend Migrant Health Act and increase appropriation.
